Detailed Description

template<class VoxelT, class MomentT>
class ZernikeMoments< VoxelT, MomentT >

Class representing the Zernike moments

Member Function Documentation

template<class VoxelT, class MomentT>
void ZernikeMoments< VoxelT, MomentT >::Compute (   ) 
 

Computes the Zernike moments. This computation is data dependent and has to be performed for each new object and/or transformation.

ScaledGeometricalMoments< VoxelT, MomentT > &  _gm
) 
 

Computes all coefficients that are input data independent

T  _xCOG,

T  _zCOG,
T  _scale,
int  _minN = 0,
int  _maxN = 100,
int  _minL = 0,
int  _maxL = 100

The function previously encoded as complex valued Zernike moments, is reconstructed. _grid is the output grid containing the reconstructed function.
